title: No Battle No Life - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Clever Protagonist   Firearms   Kingdoms   Male Protagonist   Military   MMORPG   Romantic Subplot   Virtual Reality   Wars
author: 大和poi
description:
“France! France! Formerly known as the strongest nation but now the royal family has fallen! The bastard new king goes around to gamble, fornicate and drink only to owe debts everywhere before running off with his sister-in-law!”

“Eh, bro, why haven’t I seen you before eh?”

“Because I am that new king…” The black haired youth replied as he sat in the Palais des Tuileries with a helpless look…>
